name: Squats
how_to_perform:
1. Start by standing with your feet shoulder-width apart, with your hands placed at your sides.
2. Engage your core and lower your body down into a squat position, making sure to keep the weight back in your heels and not letting the knees stretch past your toes.
3. Lower down so that your thighs are parallel to the ground or as low as is comfortable for you.
4. Use your legs and glutes to push yourself back up to the starting position, squeezing them at the top of the movement.
5. Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.
short_summary: Squats are a lower body exercise that primarily works the quadriceps, hamstrings, glutes, and calve muscles.
